title.rendered: West Indies Women vs England Women, 5th T20I: Today’s Match Preview, Fantasy Cricket Tips

content.rendered:
We have opted for a fantasy cricket team based on the recent performances, overall impact, and credit points.

Probable XIs

West Indies: Hayley Matthews (c), Aaliyah Alleyne, Shemaine Campbelle (wk), Rashada Williams, Trishan Holder, Sheneta Grimmond, Afy Fletcher, Cherry Ann Fraser, Shabika Gajnabi, Djenaba Joseph, Kaysia Schultz

England: Lauren Winfield-Hill, Sophia Dunkley, Natalie Sciver, Heather Knight (c), Amy Jones (wk), Maia Bouchier, Sophie Ecclestone, Katherine Brunt, Charlotte Dean, Sarah Glenn, Lauren Bell

Pitch Report

Venue: Kensington Oval, Bridgetown, Barbados

(Based on the last 3 games)

1st innings average score: 143

2nd innings average score: 116

Wickets per innings: 8

Type: Even battle between the bat and ball.

Weather: Slightly cloudy.

Wins

Batting 1st: 100%

Batting 2nd: —

Fantasy Tips of the Day

Of the 46 wickets that fell in the last 3 games at the venue, as many as 27 belonged to the spinners. The bulk of the wickets that the pacers took came at the death. Otherwise, the spinners dominated through and through.

More fantasy points have been collected by the team batting first. However, it is also important to note that England have batted first in the last 3 T20Is and that the West Indies have not done well chasing lately.

Given the spinners have been majorly operating in the middle overs, the top order has fared well compared to the middle order.
